name: From Afar So Alone
description:
----From Afar So Alone------
From Afar so Alone is a First Person Shooter
Survive your way through, you may be a strong soldier, but your enemies are stronger and numerous. Fight your way through to get to the objective.
From Afar So Alone is brought to you by Naive Interactive

controls
W- move forward
A - move left
S- Move Back
D- Move RIght
esc - pause menu
space - jump
Q - Melee
C - Crouch
R - Reload Weapon
left mouse button - shoot
right mouse button - Iron Sights
